# Suffocation, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[9th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 9]], [[9th Level Witch Spells|Witch 9]], [[9th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 9]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 19th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 19]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a vial containing a bit of the casterâ€™s breath)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature/2 levels (no two of which may be more than 30 feet apart)

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg. 248

This spell functions as *[[Suffocation (Spell)|suffocation]]* except as noted above. Note that the duration of this spell is much longer, forcing those suffering from the effect to make far more Fortitude saves to stave off eventual suffocation.
